actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 5, United States Code, to reform the manner in which Border Patrol agents are compensated.
short_title: Border Patrol Agent Pay Reform Technical Amendments Act of 2018
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Border Patrol Agent Pay Reform Technical Amendments Act of 2018

This bill makes changes to how the pay for border patrol agents is calculated.
